homepage.not-authorized: Your profile does not have access to the features that this area offers. Contact your Company Administrator.
homepage.homepage-title: Welcome to the back office area of ​​the App Store!
homepage.homepage-subtitle: To access the functionalities of this area, just click on 'Login'.

common.name: Name
common.confirm-operation: Are you sure you want to confirm this operation?

assignpermission.form-step-1: Let's start by selecting the Company to filter the Apps
assignpermission.form-step-2: Now, select the App that the member will be part of
assignpermission.form-step-3: Select the member who will be assigned the permission
assignpermission.form-step-4: Finally, select the group the member will be part of and its permissions
assignpermission.title: Permission Assignments Panel
assignpermission.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing permission assignments on Back Office
assignpermission.group-description: Choose de permission group that you want:
assignpermission.permissions-description: Select which permissions this member will have access to:
assignpermission.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the assignment, be sure what are the implications of this action.

company.title: Companies Panel
company.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing companies on Back Office.
company.form-step-1: Let's start by defining the name of your Company
company.form-step-2: Now, fill in the fields with more detailed information about the company
company.company-name: What is the name of the company?
company.company-email: What is the email of the company?
company.company-phone: What is the phone number of the company?
company.company-contact: What is the contact of the company?
company.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the Company, be sure what are the implications of this action.

user.title: Users Panel
user.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing users of your companies on Back Office.
user.user-email: What is the email of the user?
user.form-step-1: Let's start by identifying the Company the User will be part of
user.form-step-2: Now, type the User's email to be added to the Company
user.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the User, be sure what are the implications of this action.
user.user-done: Thanks! User Company was successfully created.

app.title: Apps Panel
app.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing apps on Back Office.
app.form-step-1: Let's start by selecting the Company your App will be part of
app.form-step-2: Now, fill in the fields with more detailed information about the App
app.app-name: What is the name of the app?
app.app-slug: What is the slug of the app?
app.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the App, be sure what are the implications of this action.

permission-group.title: Permission Groups Panel
permission-group.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing permission groups on Back Office.
permission-group.form-step-1: Let's start by selecting the Company your Permission Group will be part of
permission-group.form-step-2: Now, select the App your Permission Group will be part of
permission-group.form-step-3: Finally, fill in the fields with more detailed information about the Permission Group
permission-group.permission-group-name: What is the name of the permission group?
permission-group.permission-group-slug: What is the slug of the permission group?
permission-group.permission-group-done: Thanks! Permission Group was successfully created.
permission-group.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the Permission Group, be sure what are the implications of this action.

permission.title: Permissions Panel
permission.subtitle: Here you can manage the existing permissions on Back Office.
permission.form-step-1: Let's start by identifying the Company
permission.form-step-2: Now, let's select the App your Permission will be part of
permission.form-step-3: At this step, let's select the Permission Group your Permission will be part of
permission.form-step-4: Finally, fill in the fields with more detailed information about the Permission
permission.permission-name: What is the name of the permission?
permission.permission-slug: What is the slug of the permission?
permission.delete-subtitle: Before deleting the Permission, be sure what are the implications of this action.

dashboard.title: Welcome to the Back Office area
dashboard.subtitle: Here you can manage everything your company can do:

error.company-delete-error: An error occurred when deleting the Company, try again!

error.app-delete-error: An error occurred when deleting the App, try again!

error.permission-group-delete-error: An error occurred when deleting the Permission Group, try again!

error.user-delete-error: An error occurred when deleting the User, try again!

not-found.text: Sorry, we couldn't find what you are looking for. Try refreshing the page or check back later.
